resources.string: A messenger **designed and tailored to the needs** of the Russian-speaking audience.
Start a conversation on one device and seamlessly continue it on another with **instant data sync**.
**We’ve simplified everything** so you can focus on what matters most—your conversations and ideas.
**Your data is yours and yours alone.** Dahl doesn’t use it for advertising or share it with third parties.
Fast message delivery, **even with a weak internet connection.**
**Express yourself freely** with emojis, stickers, and GIFs.
**Read** with Dahl. **Write** with Dahl. **Stay connected** with Dahl.
